# Write Vtk Rectilinear Grid

## Group (Subgroup)

I/O Filters

## Description

This Filter writes a VTK legacy file with a Dataset type of `RECTILINEAR_GRID`. The user can select which arrays from the Image Geometry will be written to the file.
